author: davisp
msg: Closes COUCHDB-334 - Add JSONP support to CouchDB
Use JSONP by providing a ?callback=function_name URL paramter for any URL

author: jaz
msg: refactored the service which stores incoming mail to be thread safe, now using the specific methods on the message wrapper

author: jaz
msg: more improvements to the message wrapper logic for getting attachments and reading multipart messages; added methods to get headers; mail container now marks messages which are too big to process (the max size setting) as read (but never deleted) so they are not always being checked but remain in the mailbox for human review

author: jrbauer
msg: OPENJPA-926 Add annotation support for embeddables and correct Transient issue

author: gmcdonald
msg: Add a condition to check that when set, forrest.echo must be true to run target, default is false. Fix for FOR-1055
